title: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcurl.dll is either not designed to run on Windows

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcurl.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc0000020

I've tried to run it as an administrator, updated my laptop and it doesn't work

there's a pic of the error i really could use some help :(

replies.body: update: i did what flaming amarant said on the post and it worked then suddenly after 2 days this came back and now ive been reinstalling league more than 10 times the past 5 days. im getting stick and tired of this bullshit so if someone from riot or someone who knows how to fix this shit permanently then that would be a really great help for me, ive been playing league since season 1 and now this shit makes me wanna stop playing it coz everytime i reinstall this shit would happen after 1 game. im so disappointed with this. and i know that im not the only one thats having this problem.
Yeah I have a same problem. It happed more than 10 times the past a week. I reinstalled the game more than 5 times and its still not working.

https://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2Fi.gyazo.com%2Fd339930159d84319872f8307a76ad117.png&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425&height=800

delete the league client then open the launcher as an admin it should work
this worked now for me thanks!
No problem anytime don't forget to rep

Thanks for the screenshot!  Running as Admin is a good start because a setting might be blocking a proper update, so the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help.  Once finished, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for a clean reinstall.
I have a repairing faild. Please help me

delete the league client then open the launcher as an admin it should work - thanks
tpcameron22 (NA)  - 4 days ago

Having same issue, deleted everything, uninstalled everything.  reinstalled - i get in once.  Then exit and when come back in same error.
I have tried hextec repair tool (had to uninstall prior version) and it didn't fix.
Biggest pain is after reinstalling have to reset video level in first game... plus the 20 min to reinstall .... is this a punishment or something lol... 20 min auto game suspension.
having the same Problem, neither hextech tool nor running as admin helped
followed FlamingAmarant's guide and it worked. just uninstall the game then delete riot games folder on your computer then reinstall it.

I have the same problem. Tried re-installing, but nothing helps.



Edit: Delete the game folder after uninstalling, then install. Helped for me.
